channel.title: Diane Larlus's Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content on Diane Larlus's Personal Page

item.title: News
item.description: 2023 Invited speaker at the Self-Supervised Learning - Theory and Practice at NeurIPS23 EPIC Fields accepted at NeurIPS23 benchmark and dataset track [project page] Invited speaker at the workshop on Assistive Computer Vision and Robotics at ICCV23 Release of the EPIC Fields dataset and benchmark [project page] Paper accepted at CoLLAs23: RaSP: Relation-aware Semantic Prior for Weakly Supervised Incremental Segmentation [paper] 2 papers accepted at CVPR23 Fake it till you make it: learning transferable representations from synthetic ImageNet clones [project page] SLACK: Stable Learning of Augmentations with Cold-start and KL regularization [project page] Keynote speaker at two CVPR23 workshops, the Continual Learning in Computer vision and the Earth Vision ones Paper accepted at ICLR23: No Reason for No Supervision: Improved Generalization in Supervised Models [paper, project page] Doctoral Consortium chair for ICCV23 Area Chair for ICCV23, CVPR24 2022

item.title: Publications
item.description: NeurIPS23 - EPIC Fields: Marrying 3D Geometry and Video Understanding └─ project page CoLLAs23 - RaSP: Relation-aware Semantic Prior for Weakly Supervised Incremental Segmentation Subhankar Roy, Riccardo Volpi, Gabriela Csurka, Diane Larlus └─ paper CVPR23 - Fake it till you make it: learning transferable representations from synthetic ImageNet clones Mert Bulent Sariyildiz, Karteek Alahari, Diane Larlus, Yannis Kalantidis └─ paper CVPR23 - SLACK: Stable Learning of Augmentations with Cold-start and KL regularization Juliette Marrie.

item.title: Recent talks
item.description: Oct 2023 Invited talk at the Assistive Computer Vision and Robotics workshop at ICCV23 - Towards Geometric Understanding in Egocentric Videos Jun 2023 Invited talk at the Continual Learning in Computer Vision workshop at CVPR23 - Lifelong visual representation learning [Video] Jun 2023 Invited talk at the EarthVision workshop at CVPR23 - Lifelong visual representation learning Sep 2022 Invited talk at the Thoth team at Inria - Towards Semantic Understanding in Egocentric Videos Sep 2022 Invited talk at the Linkmedia Speaks Science seminar series - Lifelong visual representation learning [Video] Jul 2022 Invited talk at the 1st International Workshop on Pervasive Artificial Intelligence - Lifelong visual representation learning Jul 2022 Keynote Speaker at CAp-RFIAP 2022 - Lifelong visual representation learning Jun 2022 Invited talk at the O-DRUM Workshop at CVPR22 - Using Text in Computer Vision Apr 2022 Invited talk at GDR TAL Day - Learning transferable visual representations Jan 2022 Invited talk at KUIS AI Meetings - Towards Semantic Understanding in Egocentric Videos Jun 2021 Invited talk at the Women in Computer Vision (WiCV) Workshop at CVPR21 - Lifelong visual representation learning [Video] May 2021 Invited talk at the ANITI research institute (scientific seminar) - Learning from weak supervision and mitigating catastrophic forgetting Oct 2020 Keynote Speaker for MIAI Days - Lifelong visual representation learning Aug 2020 Invited talk at the ILR Workshop at ECCV20 - From Instance-Level to Semantic Image Retrieval [Video] Nov 2019 Invited talk at the SOLARIS Workshop - Self-supervised learning for category-level geometry estimation Apr 2019 Invited talk at the StatLearn 19 conference - Learning Image Representations for Efficient Visual Search Nov 2018 Invited speaker, AI and Vision session at SophIA Summit - Visual Search Jul 2018 Lecture at the PRAIRIE Artificial Intelligence summer school (PAISS) [slides] - Visual Search Older: see CV

item.title: Teaching
item.description: 2023/2024 L’apprentissage continu de représentations visuelles - ENSIMAG, Grenoble (webpage) Dec 2023 Lifelong visual representation learning - Master AI 4 One Health, UGA, Grenoble Sep 2023 Keynote speaker at the VISMAC International Summer School on Machine Vision (VISMAC 2023) 2023 Découvrir l’IA par le jeu (Discover AI with games, a 2 day training session for high school teachers) - Maison pour la Science Alpes-Dauphiné 2022/2023 L’apprentissage continu de représentations visuelles - ENSIMAG, Grenoble Dec 2022 Lifelong visual representation learning - Master AI 4 One Health, UGA, Grenoble 2022 Découvrir l’IA par le jeu (Discover AI with games, a 2 day training session for high school teachers) - Maison pour la Science Alpes-Dauphiné Jan 2022 Guest lecture on Visual Search - Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology (PTIT), Vietnam 2021/2022 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble Nov 2021 Lifelong visual representation learning - Master AI 4 One Health, UGA, Grenoble May 2021 Guest lecture on Visual Search - Hanoi University of Science and Technology (HUST), Vietnam 2020/2021 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble 2020 Découvrir l’IA par le jeu (Discover AI with games, a 2 day training session for high school teachers) - Maison pour la Science Alpes-Dauphiné Nov 2019 Lecture on Visual Search as part of the ‘Deep Learning’ course for the MVA master - ENS Paris 2019/2020 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble Feb 2019 Lecture on Visual Search as part of the ‘Deep Learning in Practice’ course for the MVA master - ENS Paris 2018/2019 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble July 2018 Lecture on Visual Search at the PRAIRIE Artificial Intelligence summer school (PAISS 2018) [slides] Older: see CV

item.title: News
item.description: 2020 Best reviewer award at NeurIPS20 Keynote speaker at the MIAI DAY 2020 event Paper accepted at NeurIPS20: Hard negative mixing for contrastive learning [project page, video] Invited talk at the Instance-Level Recognition Workshop at ECCV20 [video] Paper accepted at ECCV20: Learning Visual Representations with Caption Annotations [project page, blog] Joined as Editor for International Journal of Computer Vision Industrial chair at ECCV20 Area Chair for ECCV20 and CVPR20 2019
